DESCRIPTION: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Bleed is reduced by #b1. NL #yNon-Lethal
Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, add that many marks to the enemy that dealt the damage.
Non-Lethal damage will not reduce the enemy below 1 health, unless the enemy is exactly at 1 health with no block.
Whenever this creature takes attack damage, the attacker gains that much health. Marks decrease by 5 or by half each turn, whichever is greater.
When you take attack damage from an enemy, at end of turn deal the same damage in return to that enemy.
Rips a soul from a creature and binds it into servitude.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
